name.baseName: cement production;cement, ordinary portland cement;JT shaft kiln
水泥生产;水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥;JT立窑

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The impact of a typical JT shaft kiln process on the resource consumption, energy consumption and environmental emissions involved in the cement production life cycle was quantified using 1t of ordinary silicate cement as a functional unit.
以1t普通硅酸盐水泥为功能单位，对JT立窑典型工艺对水泥生产生命周期中所涉及的资源消耗、能源消耗及环境排放的影响进行量化。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents the use of the JT shaft kiln process for the production of ordinary Portland cement. Applicable for the construction industry, this cement is commonly used in building materials for constructing infrastructures such as roads, bridges, and buildings.
此数据集代表JT立窑工艺生产普通硅酸盐水泥的用途。适用于建筑行业，该水泥通常用于构建道路、桥梁和建筑物等基础设施的建材。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Taking 1 ton of ordinary Portland cement as the functional unit. The scope of the research is defined as four processes: raw meal preparation, clinker burning, cement grinding, and packaging and delivery.
以 1 t 普通硅酸盐水泥为功能单位。研究范围界定为生料制备、熟料烧成、水泥粉磨、包装出厂四个工艺过程。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The resource consumption data adopts the research results of Li Songbing. The energy consumption comes from the data published by the Cement Industry Association and refers to the "2010 Cement Industry Risk Analysis Report". The emission coefficients of powder (smoke) dust and SO2 and NOx pollutants in the exhaust gas adopt the 2008 China Statistical results of pollution source census; CO2 emissions are estimated according to their sources. The research results of Gao Changming were used for the unpublished emission coefficient of JT vertical kiln.
资源消耗数据采用李松炳的研究成果，能源消耗来自水泥工业协会公布的数据并参考《2010年水泥行业风险分析报告》，粉（烟）尘以及废气中的SO2、NOx污染物排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果；CO2排放按其来源进行估算。对没有公布的JT立窑的排放系数采用高长明的研究成果。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Heat consumption: Divide 0.7 and convert to unit cement heat consumption.
热耗：除0.7，换算为单位水泥热耗。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 周志刚. (2011). 水泥工业物质代谢及生态化转型研究 [博士, 天津大学].
周志刚. (2011). 水泥工业物质代谢及生态化转型研究 [博士, 天津大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, include the impacts of energy and resource consumption, emissions of dust, SO2, and NOx during cement production phases of raw meal preparation, clinker burning, cement grinding, and packaging and delivery. Note that CO2 emissions should be accounted for by their specific sources. Emission factors from Gao Changming's research should be used for JT shaft kiln emissions not published elsewhere. Thermal consumption data must be normalized by dividing by 0.7 to represent unit cement heat consumption appropriately.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，需要包括生料制备、熟料烧成、水泥粉磨、包装出厂等水泥生产各阶段的能源与资源消耗、粉尘、二氧化硫和氮氧化物排放的影响。注意二氧化碳排放应根据其具体来源进行核算。未公开的JT立窑排放系数应使用高长明的研究成果。热耗数据需要通过除以0.7来归一化，以恰当代表单位水泥的热耗。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

exchange.generalComment: Limestone. The resource consumption data is based on the research results of Li Songbing.
石灰石。资源消耗数据采用李松炳的研究成果。

Heat consumption (converted to standard coal consumption). Standard coal is not an actual substance, but a conversion method.Data processing: The original literature states a heat consumption of 114.2 kgce/t clinker, and since 1 ton of cement contains 0.7 tons of clinker, it is converted to kgce/t cement for data input.Due to the lack of data on natural gas, petroleum coke, alternative fuels, and fuel oil consumption, it is assumed that all heat consumption comes from coal combustion. The conversion factor between raw coal and standard coal is 1 kg raw coal = 0.7143 kg standard coal.
热耗。标准煤并非实际存在的物质，为折算方法。原文献为114.2kgce/t熟料，1t水泥含0.7t熟料，折算为kgce/t水泥录入。由于数据缺乏，假设五种工艺熟料/水泥配比系数均为0.7，即生产1吨水泥需要掺加0.7吨熟料。能源消耗来自水泥工业协会公布的数据并参考《2010年水泥行业风险分析报告》。

Electricity consumption. China's electricity industry is mainly based on thermal power generation, with the proportion of thermal power generation always above 80%. To simplify the calculation, it is assumed that all purchased electricity for cement enterprises comes from thermal power generation. The electricity consumption is calculated based on the 2008 coal consumption coefficient of thermal power generation, which is 0.349 kgce/kWh converted into standard coal consumption. The energy consumption data comes from the Cement Industry Association and is referenced in the "2010 Cement Industry Risk Analysis Report".
电耗。我国电力行业以火电发电为主，火力发电的比例一直在80%以上，为了简化计算，假设水泥企业外购电力全部来自火力发电，电力消耗按2008年火力发电煤耗系数0.349kgce/kwh转化为标煤的消耗。能源消耗来自水泥工业协会公布的数据并参考《2010年水泥行业风险分析报告》。

Dust and particulate matter, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter. The emission factor of particulate matter (PM) pollutant in flue gas is based on the statistical results of the 2008 China Pollution Source Census.
烟尘和粉尘，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。粉（烟）尘排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果。
SO2. The emission factor of SO2 pollutant in flue gas is based on the statistical results of the 2008 China Pollution Source Census.
SO2。废气中的SO2污染物排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果。
NOx. The emission factor of NOx pollutant in flue gas is based on the statistical results of the 2008 China Pollution Source Census.
NOx。废气中的NOx污染物排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果。

CO2. CO2 emissions are estimated based on their sources. The specific estimation method is as follows:①CO2 produced from carbonate decomposition. During the cement production process, the decomposition of limestone to produce cement clinker requires CaO, which also generates CO2. The chemical reaction is as follows: CaCO3→CaO+CO2↑. The chemical equation for the decomposition of CaCO3 shows that for every 1 part of CaO produced, 0.7857 parts of CO2 are also generated. Based on the average content of CaO in the main mineral components of ordinary Portland cement in China, which ranges from 62% to 67%, assuming 65%, the CO2 produced from the decomposition of CaCO3 for every ton of cement clinker produced is: 1 ton × 0.7857 × 65% = 0.5071 ton. In addition, cement raw materials usually contain a small amount of magnesium carbonate, which also decomposes and produces CO2 during calcination. The chemical reaction is as follows: MgCO3→MgO+CO2↑. The chemical equation for the decomposition of MgCO3 shows that for every 1 part of MgO produced, 1.1 parts of CO2 are also generated. Based on the average content of MgO in the main mineral components of ordinary Portland cement in China, which ranges from 1% to 3%, assuming 1.5%, the CO2 produced from the decomposition of magnesium carbonate for every ton of cement clinker produced is: 1 ton × 1.1 × 1.5% = 0.0165 ton. In summary, the total amount of CO2 produced from carbonate decomposition during cement clinker production is: 0.5071 ton + 0.0165 ton = 0.5236 ton.②CO2 emitted from cement kiln fuel combustion. The formation of cement clinker requires high-temperature calcination, during which CO2 is generated from fuel combustion to provide high temperature. According to research results from the IPCC, the carbon emission factor of raw coal in China is 2.7715 kg CO2/kg of raw coal.

CO2。CO2排放按其来源进行估算。具体估算方法如下：①碳酸分解产生的CO2。水泥生产过程中石灰石的分解生成水泥熟料必须的Cao同时会生成CO2，其化学反应式为： CaCO3→Cao+CO2 ↑。CaCO3分解的化学反应式表明：每生成1份的Cao，同时会生成0.7857份的 CO2，根据国内的平均水平，我国普通硅酸盐水泥的主要矿物化学成分中CaO含量的大致波动范围为：62-67％，如果按65%计算，每生产1吨水泥熟料，由CaCO3分解产生CO2为：1t×0.7857×65％=0.5071t。 另外，水泥生料中通常含有少量的碳酸镁，碳酸镁在煅烧过程中分解也会产 生CO2，其化学反应式为：MgCO3→Mgo+CO2↑。MgCO3分解的化学反应式表明：每生成1份的 Mgo，同时会生成1.1份的CO2，根据国内的平均水平，我国普通硅酸盐水泥的主要矿物化学成分中MgO含量的大致波动范围为：1-3％，如果按1.5%计算，每生产1t水泥熟料，由碳酸镁分解产生的CO2为：1t×1.1×1.5％＝0.0165t。 综合计算，在水泥熟料生产过程中，由碳酸盐分解产生的CO2总量为：0.5107t + 0.0165t=0.5272t。②水泥窑燃料燃烧排放的CO2。水泥熟料的形成需要高温煅烧，煅烧过程中燃料燃烧提供高温的过程中会生成CO2，根据IPCC的研究成果，我国原煤的碳排放系数为2.7715kgCO2/kg原煤。
